summary: A new female body replacer, with smaller breasts. Now with Bodyslide preset and HDT support!
descriptionHtml:
[i][url=https://flic.kr/p/rDHpjF][center][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7635/16835707599_cbbfd03be6_c.jpg[/img][/center][center][/center][/url]
What is it?[/i]
[size=3]It's a Sevenbase based general female body replacer made with Bodyslide for UNP. Â Since there are no armor conversions yet, the bodies will be only visible while your characters are naked.[/size]

[i]Backstory[/i]
[size=3]I always wanted to create a female body with lesser breasts than the most body replacers but with wide hips. First I made the UNPF bodies, but they are very extreme and quite unnatural. I always loved Sevenbase, but it has so huge breasts... finally, I found a way to make them smaller (and get rid of the animations) and I also made a lot of small changes on the bodies.

[i]The two versions[/i]
Queen is bigger breasts, wider hips and bigger butt. Princess has small breasts and looks more skinny.
[color=#9fc5e8][center]
From:Lillysdad2009

Ok guys n gals, everything seems to have been completed to the best of my ability. If there are any complaints, suggestions etc. Just let me know, I am more than happy to listen to anything you may have to say. Download and enjoy.[/center][/color]



[url=https://flic.kr/p/rW3pd7][center][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7641/17020478282_6eda118e3b_c.jpg[/img][/center][/url]

[/size][i]Armors and outfits
[/i][size=3]None, I failed to learn how to make one :( Conversions are very welcomed![/size]

[i]Requirements[/i]
[size=3]UNP dimonized body[/size]
[size=3]some UNP compatible textures (I recommand SG, Women of Skyrim+Real girl or Mature v2)
[/size]The textures on the screenshots are not included!

[i]Installation[/i]
[size=3]Simply, copy the files to your Skyrim folder. Overwrite everything (backup your previous files first).

[i]Textures and races used on the screenshots[/i]
Abyssal dremora race (google it)
Lunari race with Women of Skyrim + real girls texture
SG textures
Tranquility enb


[/size][size=4]Screenshots are very welcomed![/size]
author: Lady Fiszi and Lillysdad2009
